Summary Note:
Jade Ambre Marchand and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Paris. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
Jade Ambre Marchand is a 54 year old VP of Exploration from France.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons she decided to join.
Family Background: Jade Ambre Marchand is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Jade earned her secondary school diploma from Lyc√©e Janson-de-Sailly in 1989.
In 1994, Jade graduated from ESSEC Business School with a degree.
Jade earned her additionally degree from HEC Paris in 1999.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 30 years, Jade Ambre Marchand brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
At Engie S.A., Jade Ambre Marchand held the position of Drilling Engineer from 1995 to 1998, developing essential skills in the field.
She then transitioned to Perenco S.A. as a Reservoir Engineer, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 1999 to 2000.
She spent 5 years working as a Operations Manager at Perenco S.A., refining her expertise and building a strong network.
Her next role was as a VP of Exploration at EDF S.A., where she applied her extensive experience to drive innovation from 2005 till now.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 980000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She has villa located in Brest, worth 2500000 EUR.


Following the passing of her grandmother, a successful Stock Trader, she received an inheritance of 810000 EUR in 2013, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Jade as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
